explains: adj. 不在意的，未觉察到的；遗忘的，健忘的

sentences.en: You eventually become oblivious to the noise.
sentences.cn: 你终究会变得不在意吵闹声的。

sentences.en: He drove off, oblivious of the damage he had caused.
sentences.cn: 他车开走了，没有注意到他所造成的损害。

sentences.en: She lay motionless where she was, oblivious to pain.
sentences.cn: 她一动不动地躺在原地，感觉不到疼痛。
